commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use `mate` rather than txmt url scheme
commits.body: This prevents the incorrect version of TextMate being launched when running the command.

commits.author: statuser
commits.summary: Return to current line with a selection (R.app & Step)
commits.body: Previously only handled the case where caret was on line. Now handles the case where a selection is submitted. Both standard selections and block (option) selections. Fixes #5.
